name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Primewire For PC,windows and Mac(Download Safely)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to fetch images/IMDb ratings for movies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our "Primewire for PC, Windows, and Mac"This simple Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly retrieve movie details like name, IMDb rating, and release date. With easy-to-use features, just enter the movie title, click 'Fetch IMDb Rating,' and enjoy seamless access to information.

This is my extension features:

1) Enter  Movie Titel: If you provide the name of any movie here, you can easily use the Chrome extension to get the movie's name, IMDb rating, and release date.

2) Fetch IMDB Rating: Write the movie title and click 'Fetch IMDb Rating' to know the movie details.

3) Simple Extension

✅ You Primewire Extension Features

✅ How To Use Primewire on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: If you enter the name of a movie here, you can conveniently utilize the Chrome extension to retrieve details such as the movie's title, IMDb rating, and release date. Simply type the movie title and click 'Fetch IMDb Rating' to access its details.

Step 4: Enjoy a safer browsing experience!


✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "Primewire for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Primewire Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Primewire Android app.
